metadata.Title: CVE-2015-8367 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - low.
metadata.Description:
The phase_one_correct function in Libraw before 0.17.1 allows attackers to cause memory errors and possibly execute arbitrary code, related to memory object initialization.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-8367` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libraw-bin - 0.18.2-1
libraw20 - 0.18.2-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: exactimage package in kinetic is affected and needs fixing.
kodi package in kinetic is affected and needs fixing.
libraw package in kinetic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.18.2-1').
rawtherapee package in kinetic is affected and needs fixing.
